snippet: Needing only a tie to advance to the quarterfinals of the Copa América, the United States won’t sit back and will instead “set the tone” for the match, Coach Jurgen Klinsmann said.
abstract: United States men's national soccer team coach Jurgen Klinsmann assures fans that team will continue to play aggressively, even though they only need tie in upcoming game against Paraguay to reach quarterfinals of Copa America Centenario; other tournament news noted.
lead_paragraph: Needing only a tie to advance to the quarterfinals of the Copa América, the United States won’t sit back and will instead “set the tone” for the match, Coach Jurgen Klinsmann said.

headline.main: Against Paraguay, Americans Plan to Play an Aggressive Match
headline.print_headline: Against Paraguay, U.S. Plans an Aggressive Strategy Early

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
